com.secw.manage

类 Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.secw.manage.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Title : Controller.java Description : This class is to manage all managers
    作者:
    Zhang Yufeng, Wang Haozhe

      The constructor of driverManager class It creates all managers when invoked.

      The changeStatus method of controller class This method is used to change statuses of driver and train.

      The egodic method of controller class This method is used to find a corresponding object if given an id and a type.

      The getRouteData method of controller class This method is used to get all route list.

      The getSpanTime method of controller class This method is used to get the whole time span of a route.

      The getStationData method of controller class This method is used to get all station list.

      The getTrainData method of controller class This method is used to get all train list.
      static boolean removeAvailableDriver(int index)
      The removeAvailableDriver method of controller class This method is used to remove a driver from available list.
      static boolean removeAvailableTrain(int index)
      The removeAvailableTrain method of controller class This method is used to remove a train from available list.
